Description: Fragment of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Handle to sharp turn. Rectangular stamp. Clay near fine light brown.
Curator's comments: Probably the same piece as drawn by Petrie (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 203, 5). From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0189.15. Name Xenophantos.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0967)
